metadata.Title: CVE-2022-23308 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
valid.c in libxml2 before 2.9.13 has a use-after-free of ID and IDREF attributes.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-23308` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxml2 - 2.9.4+dfsg1-6.1ubuntu1.5
libxml2-utils - 2.9.4+dfsg1-6.1ubuntu1.5
python-libxml2 - 2.9.4+dfsg1-6.1ubuntu1.5
python3-libxml2 - 2.9.4+dfsg1-6.1ubuntu1.5
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libxml2 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.9.4+dfsg1-6.1ubuntu1.5').
